tool_description: Manages instructor teaching assignments by matching instructor availability, qualifications, and preferences with course requirements and schedules.

course_assignments.description: List of course IDs to assign to instructor

availability_days.description: Days instructor is available to teach

availability_start.description: Earliest available teaching time in HH:MM format

availability_end.description: Latest available teaching time in HH:MM format

max_teaching_load.description: Maximum number of courses instructor can teach

preferred_subjects.description: Subject areas instructor prefers to teach

error_messages: Instructor not found: The specified instructor_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid course assignment: One or more course_assignments do not exist.
Teaching load exceeded: course_assignments exceed max_teaching_load limit.
Invalid availability: availability_start must be earlier than availability_end.
Invalid time format: availability times must be in HH:MM format.
Invalid days: availability_days must contain valid weekday names.
Schedule conflict: Assigned courses conflict with instructor availability.
usage: Provide instructor_id, course_assignments, availability_days, availability_start, and availability_end. Optionally set max_teaching_load, preferred_subjects, and office_hours_required to customize assignment constraints.

unassigned_courses.description: Courses that could not be assigned

teaching_schedule.description: Complete teaching schedule in 'Day HH:MM-HH:MM CourseID' format
